name: Avoid unassigned default values in Functions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Functions with unassigned default values.
output:
"This report lists all the Functions with unassigned default values.

This QR provides the following information:
Function  full name."
rationale: Unassigned values are very dangerous because in some cases this can cause the failure of the whole application.
remediation: Modify the source code and try to reduce the use of unassigned values inside Functions.
